name: BOT ARENA (Salmonelaela)
description:
Tirsur is a Empire where enginuity , tinkering and competition are a core aspects of the society. Every year builders & pilots fight with bots to demonstrate who is de best. Become a pilot and fight to death  to achieve glory.

Choose between two bots with diferentes stats that suit your gameplay more. Fight in arena full of danger and mortalweapons.

GAME FEATURE

  • 2 original bots to choose with unique abilty
  • 2-4 players(local)
  • Original Soundtrack and sound effects
  • Short games

This game is a verticalslice is not a fullgame.
